 #define LED0  LATC2
 #define LED1  LATC1
 #define LED2  LATC0
 #define LED3  LATA7
 #define LED4  LATA6
 #define LED5  LATA4
 #define LED6  LATD7

 #define LED8  LATD5

 ANSELA  = 0b00000000;
 ANSELB  = 0b00000000;
 ANSELD  = 0b00000000;
 ANSELE  = 0b00000000;
 LATA    = 0b11010000;
 LATB    = 0b00000000;
 LATC    = 0b00000111;
 LATD    = 0b11111111;
 LATE    = 0b00000000;
 TRISA   = 0b00000000;
 TRISB   = 0b00000000;
 TRISC   = 0b00000000;
 TRISD   = 0b00000000;
 TRISE   = 0b00000000;
